entries.name: json_create(object)
entries.desc: Deserializes JSON string by converting Julian year y, month m, day d and Day of Calendar Reform sg to Date.

entries.name: as_json(*)
entries.desc: Returns a hash, that will be turned into a JSON object and represent this object.

entries.name: to_json(*args)
entries.desc: Stores class name (Date) with Julian year y, month m, day d and Day of Calendar Reform sg as JSON string
